column5: Congratulations! Looks like your gonna outfish Dad!!!!! Way to go!!!!

on Saturday me and my dad went to lake O. we went to the blue zone and cought a small laker (sorry no pics, batteries died) on sunday i went on lake e and went with Live2Fish85, and i caught my PB smallie - a nice fat 16"er. Thanks Chris for the invite  today we went to the bluffson Long Point Bay and I caught my first ever Pike! they are a good fighters.  Dad got one too!  thos one swalled my lucky lure. I had a graet three day fishing days. too bad i could not do this all weekend.
I know that spot  Nice Going G-Man
That right there is a great report....congrats on the PB!!!!
Great stuff fella !! Next time Dad's will be smaller than yours!!
WTG  G-Man    Congrats on your PB Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice going guys and congrats on the new PB
Way to go guys!  We will make you into Lake Erie converts yet! Mike
Way to go G!!!  Looks like you two had a great weekend.  Nice going, Rick...three days of fishing to end your season with the boat.
Way to go, G-Man! Congrats on your PB. Glad to see you're wearing your PFD. Keep setting a good example for that dad of yours.  Thanks for sharing your weekend.
Congrats! A 16" bass is a great catch.
Three species in three days... Now that is what I call a great time!
G-Man, you're a good fisherman.  I hope to see more reports from you.
awsome first pike!!  they are good fighters!! my first pike was about 18" long

Great report G-Man. It was nice to meet you and it was great to get out on the water with you and your dad. Glad to hear you and your dad had some good luck out at the bluffs, looks like you guys had a better day there.
Congrats G - that was a great way to wrap up your first year on the water - of course you outfished me two of the three days, just like in the spring.  Well, there's always next year
Been waiting to see this report G-Man...wyg....nice fishes!  Kepp the reports coming!
Nice report and what a great catch - I myself never caught a smallie that biiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiig
thanks guys for all the great comments this year. Long wait till April BTW Wayne they were the same size  dad just cheated and held it closer to the camera

Awesome report G-Man! Great fishing and great reporting! I love the jab at your Dad for holding the fish closer to the camera!  And I hear ya about having to wait til April now! I just got into fishing myself at the end of this summer and that's all I want to do now! And I have been swamped with an unexpected family medical emergency so haven't been able to even dock fish on weekends let alone watch the season end!  So I can't wait til April either!
Great report Dude !! Always makes me sad when thBe end of softwater season winds down.But still a few good weekends to go.
Awesome work G-man.. Nice fish..Dad sure looks like he has met his match this time...Congrats to you both!
congrats on your pb
wtg G-Man
You wrote a very good post.  Nice job catching those fish.  You have fallen in love with one of the most amazing sports and it looks like you and your dad are having a wonderful time together.
Nice shootin G Man! Congrates on the personal best...
